data.name: Geometric Sniper - Blood in Paris - Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey the atmosphere of the game, leaving your computer's desktop with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Geometric Sniper Blood in Paris” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\Geometric Sniper Blood in Paris\ Geometric Sniper-Blood in Paris-Wallpapers).
